remarks:
Distributive law for Cartesian product over union.  Similar to Theorem 103 of [Suppes] p. 52.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2002.) 

---

 Distributive law for cross product over union.  Similar to Theorem 103 of [Suppes] p. 52.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2002.)
statement: xpundir $p |- ( ( A u. B ) X. C ) = ( ( A X. C ) u. ( B X. C ) ) $.
